Event: In 2015, Company X ranked as the biggest company\nin the clothing market. To know how, letâ€™s go back
To begin with, a 20-year-old young man started a\nclothing company called Company X in 2009
Then, Company X expanded its market quickly
Then, Company X got a 40 million investment
Then, Company X owned 2000 stores in 50 cities
Then, Company X  owned 6000 stores across the\ncountry, even in small counties
Then, Company X owned about 9000 stores and had\nan income of over 10 billion
Then, Company X ranked as the biggest company in\nthe clothing market
However, the clothing market began to shrink due to\nthe rise of E-commerce
Then, the sales of Company X decreased nearly 1/4
Then, Company X was stuck in great debt due to its\noverstocked commodities
Then, Company X shut down 2400 stores
At last, Company X declared bankruptcy under the\nstrike of coronavirus
